author: Fox News Insider
title: Mike Huckabee on President Trump Illegal Immigration Crackdown & Policies
text:
7 P 
Brit Hume and Mike Huckabee have critical insight on the challenges and possible fallout from President Trump's new travel ban. Don't miss The First 100 Days . 8 P 
A new poll from Harvard reveals some shocking data on sanctuary cities. The O'Reilly Factor has a must-see report. 9 P 
Trumpâ€™s new immigration order is already stirring up the conversation. Tucker Carlson takes on an advocate for more migrants in the U.S. in a powerful debate. 10 P 
Hannity at CPAC! Sean goes inside the conservative role in the Trump administration and how it impacts the president's policies. The First 100 Days Huckabee: Opposition to Trump's Immigration Policies Is 'Manufactured Outrage' Feb 22, 2017 7:32pm On "The First 100 Days" tonight, Mike Huckabee praised President Trump for keeping his campaign promise and cracking down on illegal immigration. 'Angel Mom': 'Nobody Gets Sanctuary From the Law' Feb 21, 2017 7:53pm At a "First 100 Days" town hall event tonight, an "Angel Mom" explained why she's a strong supporter of President Donald Trump's policies aimed at cracking down on illegal immigration. Fiery WATCH: Sparks Fly Over Trump Wall Plans at 'First 100 Days' Town Hall Feb 21, 2017 7:38pm In a special "First 100 Days" town hall, two attendees disagreed over President Trump's plan to build a wall on the U.S.-Mexico border.
